item.description:
Bring your own wine and beer!!!!A friend of mine is a member and he will be in charge of this function at the club. He says~~There is a lot game food. It is more of a picnic style during the day.

The function goes from 9 am to about 3-4 pm. From 10 to 2 there is: venison sausage patties, venison chili and stew along with a fish chowder. At about 2 we do the raffle which is usually pretty amazing. After the raffle there is a spread that comes out. The spread usually includes venison cutlets, venison stir fry, boar roast sliced. We usually have the mussels steamed. We are talking about having the rabbit and squirrel as well.

ALL proceeds go to the St Jude's. Last year we raised $10,000. The cost is only $10. It's BYOB and bring $$ for the raffles. It sounds like a great time!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or Rose...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: "Wild Game" Picnic Style and Raffle for a Great Cause
